column3: Thank you for attending the Kakamegea community meeting last week. We now invite you to test our SMS-based instant community report generator. I am a computer
and I only understand SMS, so don't call me. To begin, reply to this message and type, "!NGO" followed by your organization's name. (For example you might
reply and write: "!ngo Amka/Kacof") Next, I will send you back a series of questions about your mission, location, local partners, and lastly, ask you for
your email address. Just reply to each message with an SMS and you will receive an email report at the end. Thanks!
